release.change: New: Doze delay - Now you can add a delay before Doze mode activates after screen off

New: Tasker support - You can now send "com.suyashsrijan.forcedoze.DISABLE_FORCEDOZE" broadcast intent to disable the ForceDoze service, or "com.suyashsrijan.forcedoze.ENABLE_FORCEDOZE" to enable the ForceDoze service
Changed: Improvements to ForceDoze service so it works more reliably now
Fixed: Motion sensors (like proximity) get disabled while on-call
Fixed: Doze battery stats doesn't display data correctly
